name: chastely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not involve having sex, or only having sex with the person you are married to: They were determined to live chastely until they were able to get married. He bent forward and kissed her chastely on the cheek.
More examplesFewer examplesThey moved in together, chastely sharing the chores instead of a bed.He fell madly and chastely in love with a succession of unattainable women.With her demure gaze and chastely buttoned coat, she looked like any other shy young woman.
